mapper.select: SELECT outbnd_no , order_id , order_title , outbnd_from , inbnd_to , outbnd_date , outbnd_status FROM outbnd

SELECT 'OUT' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(order_id, LENGTH('OUT' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) + 1))), 0) + 1, 3, '0') as "res" FROM outbnd WHERE outbnd_no LIKE 'OUT' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%'
